sources.title: The Cat's Revenge (1954)
sources.description: When Percy the Cat attempts to blow up Little Roquefort with a cannon, he is visited by his "good angel." Unknown to the cat, the angel is Little Roquefort in disguise. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-cats-revenge-1954/

metadata.Plot: After being outsmarted by Roquefort Mouse, Percy Puss decides to get rid of the rodent with a cannon only to be interrupted by his conscience. His conscience starts to remind him of the memories with Roquefort Mouse.
